income.title: Income Log
income.description: Log capital or other non-sale related income.
income.addDescription: Fill in the details of the income entry.
income.editDescription: Update the details for this income entry.
income.noEntries: No income entries recorded. Add one to get started.
income.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete this entry's record. This action cannot be undone.
income.categoriesDescription: Add, edit, or delete income categories.
income.categoryFormDescription: Provide a name for the category.
income.deleteCategoryConfirmDescription: This will remove the category. Existing income entries with this category will prevent deletion. This action cannot be undone.
income.noCategories: No categories found. Please add one first.
